trans-unit.source: Contains information about the reason that a workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: Contiene informazioni che riguardano il motivo per il quale un'istanza del flusso di lavoro è stata sospesa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is suspended.
trans-unit.target: Quando un'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene sospesa, viene generata una classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> dall'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with a workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, then the workflow tracking infrastructure puts a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the Tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associato a un'istanza del flusso di lavoro include un elemento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configurato per un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, l'infrastruttura di rilevamento del flusso di lavoro inserisce una classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> nella proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> dell'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> che invia al servizio di rilevamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> viene utilizzata solo dal servizio di rilevamento di runtime per passare informazioni in un elemento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.

trans-unit.source: The data for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: I dati relativi a un evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=nameWithType> vengono passati in un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteSuspendedEventArgs`, which captures a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato un metodo, denominato `WriteSuspendedEventArgs`, che acquisisce un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The code writes information from the method's arguments to the console, including the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs.Error%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il codice scrive informazioni dagli argomenti del metodo nella console, incluso il valore della proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs.Error%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice è parte dell'esempio SDK EventArgs Tracking nel file Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the reason that a workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: Contiene informazioni che riguardano il motivo per il quale un'istanza del flusso di lavoro è stata sospesa.

trans-unit.source: This can come from the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend(System.String)" /> (string error) or the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error" /> property that you set on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: Tali informazioni possono provenire dal metodo <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend(System.String)" /> (errore di stringa) o dalla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error" /> impostata sull'attività <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: String value that contains the reason that a workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: Valore di stringa che contiene il motivo della sospensione di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro.
